workflow.name: Automate product ad creation with Telegram, Fal.AI & Facebook posting
workflow.description:
This workflow automates the entire process of creating and publishing social media ads ‚Äî directly from Telegram.  
By simply sending a product photo to your Telegram bot, the system analyzes the image, generates an AI-based advertising prompt, creates a marketing image via Fal.AI, writes an engaging Facebook/Instagram caption, and posts it automatically.  

This template saves hours of manual work for marketers and small business owners who constantly need to design, write, and publish product campaigns. It eliminates repetitive steps like prompt writing, AI model switching, and post scheduling ‚Äî letting you focus on strategy, not execution.  

The workflow integrates seamlessly with **Fal.AI** for image generation, **OpenAI Vision** for image analysis, and the **Facebook Graph API** for automated publishing.  
Whether you‚Äôre launching a 10.10 campaign or promoting a new product line, this template transforms your product photo into a ready-to-publish ad in just minutes.  

---

## Who‚Äôs it for
This workflow is designed for:
- **Marketers and e-commerce owners** who need to create social content quickly.  
- **Agencies** managing multiple clients‚Äô campaigns.  
- **Small business owners** who want to automate Facebook/Instagram posts.  
- **n8n creators** who want to learn AI-assisted content automation.

---

## What problem does this solve
Manually creating ad images and captions is time-consuming and repetitive.  
You need to:
1. Edit the product photo.  
2. Write a creative brief or prompt.  
3. Generate an image in Fal.AI or Midjourney.  
4. Write a caption.  
5. Log into Facebook and post.  

This workflow combines all five steps into one automation ‚Äî triggered directly by sending a Telegram message.  
It handles **AI analysis, image creation, caption writing, and posting**, removing human friction while maintaining quality and creative control.

---

## What this workflow does
The workflow is divided into **four main zones**, color-coded inside the canvas:

### üü© Zone 1 ‚Äì Product Image Analysis
- Trigger: User sends a product image to a Telegram bot.  
- n8n retrieves the file path using Telegram API.  
- OpenAI Vision analyzes the product photo and describes color, material, and shape.  
- An AI agent converts this into structured data for generating ad prompts.

### üü• Zone 2 ‚Äì Generate Ad Image Prompt
- The AI agent creates a professional advertising prompt based on the product description and campaign (e.g., ‚Äú10.10 Sale‚Äù).  
- The prompt is sent to the user for confirmation via Telegram before proceeding.

### üü® Zone 3 ‚Äì Create Ad Image via Fal.AI
- The confirmed prompt and image are sent to **Fal.AI**‚Äôs image generation API.  
- The system polls the generation status until completion.  
- The generated image is sent back to Telegram for user review and approval.

### üü¶ Zone 4 ‚Äì Write Caption & Publish
- The approved image is re-analyzed by AI to write a Facebook/Instagram caption.  
- The user confirms the text on Telegram.  
- Once approved, the workflow uploads the final post (image + caption) to Facebook automatically using the Graph API.

---

## Setup
### Prerequisites
- **n8n self-hosted or Cloud account**  
- **Telegram Bot Token** (via @BotFather)  
- **Fal.AI API key**  
- **Facebook Page Access Token** with publishing permissions  
- **OpenAI API Key** for image analysis and text generation  

### Steps
1. Create a **Telegram Bot** and paste its token into n8n Credentials.  
2. Set up **Fal.AI Credentials** under HTTP Request ‚Üí Authentication.  
3. Connect your **Facebook Page** through Facebook Graph API credentials.  
4. In the **HTTP Request node**, set:  
   - URL: `https://fal.run/fal-ai/nano-banana`  
   - Auth: Bearer {{ $credentials.FalAI.apiKey }}  
5. Configure all LLM and Vision nodes using your **OpenAI credentials**.

---

## Node settings

### üü© Analyze Image (OpenAI Vision)
```json
{
  "model": "gpt-4o-mini",
  "input": [
    {
      "role": "user",
      "content": [
        { "type": "image_url", "image_url": "{{$json.image_url}}" },
        { "type": "text", "text": "Describe this product in detail for advertising context." }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```

---

### üü• Set Node ‚Äì Prepare Fal.AI Body
```json
{
  "prompt": {{ JSON.stringify(($json.ad_prompt || '').replace(/\r?\n/g, ' ')) }},
  "image_urls": [{{ JSON.stringify($json.image_url || '') }}],
  "num_images": 1,
  "output_format": "jpeg"
}
```

---

### üü¶ HTTP Request (Facebook Graph API)
```json
{
  "method": "POST",
  "url": "https://graph.facebook.com/v19.0/me/photos",
  "body": {
    "caption": "{{ $json.caption_text }}",
    "url": "{{ $json.final_image_url }}",
    "access_token": "{{ $credentials.facebook.accessToken }}"
  }
}
```

---

## How to customize the workflow
- **Change AI Models:** Swap Fal.AI for Flux, Veo3, or SDXL by adjusting API endpoints.  
- **Add Channels:** Extend the workflow to post on LINE OA or Instagram.  
- **Add Approval Logic:** Keep Telegram confirmation steps before every publish.  
- **Brand Rules:** Adjust AI prompt templates to enforce tone, logo, or color palette consistency.  
- **Multi-language Posts:** Add translation nodes for global campaigns.

---

## Troubleshooting
| Problem | Cause | Solution |
|----------|--------|-----------|
| Telegram message not triggering | Webhook misconfigured | Reconnect Telegram Trigger |
| Fal.AI API error | Invalid JSON or token | Use `JSON.stringify()` in Set node and check credentials |
| Facebook upload fails | Missing permissions | Ensure Page Access Token has `pages_manage_posts` |
| LLM parser error | Output not valid JSON | Add `Structured Output Parser` and enforce schema |

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Security Notes
- **Do NOT hardcode API keys** in Set or HTTP Request nodes.  
- Always store credentials securely under **n8n Credentials Manager**.  
- For self-hosted setups, use `.env` variables for sensitive keys (OpenAI, Fal.AI, Facebook).  

---

### üè∑Ô∏è Hashtags
#n8n #Automation #AIworkflow #FalAI #FacebookAPI #TelegramBot #nanobanana #NoCode #MarketingAutomation #SocialMediaAI #JaruphatJ #WorkflowTemplate #OpenAI #LLM #ProductAds #CreativeAutomation

## Product Image
![Alt text](https://drive.google.com/thumbnail?id=1G0BrS1Zj1BMisa9VObeBQrR3s9ZPyMzS&sz=w300)

## Process Step
![Alt text](https://drive.google.com/thumbnail?id=1hEPQsXbhTIymeDKoav0u5nMEiTFTQzsX&sz=w300) ![Alt text](https://drive.google.com/thumbnail?id=1f_8h34SdhFGv6AxgWA7Ab5V6NdDwe4hK&sz=w300)  ![Alt text](https://drive.google.com/thumbnail?id=1I00j2SHiZ8mOQORTeVOjSNbXf0x_1dkh&sz=w300)  ![Alt text](https://drive.google.com/thumbnail?id=1YOwB-6z3kD2ITzK6ZPSyo_JtrrKTmlrB&sz=w300)

parameters.content:
### üü® Zone 3: Generate & Confirm Ad Image (Fal.AI)
**Purpose:**  
Send the prepared prompt to Fal.AI API to generate an advertising image, 
then let the user confirm the result.
**Main Steps:**
1. **Prepare Fal.AI Input Fields** ‚Äì Format prompt, image URL, and parameters for Fal.AI API.  
2. **Call Fal.AI API** ‚Äì Generate the ad image using the given prompt.  
3. **Check Fal.AI Image Status** ‚Äì Poll until image generation is completed.  
4. **Send Photo Message** ‚Äì Deliver the generated image to the user on Telegram.  
5. **User Review: Approve/Reject Generated Image** ‚Äì Ask the user to confirm the result.  
6. **Check Image Approval (Yes/No)** ‚Äì Proceed only if user confirms.

#### üü• Zone 2: Create Advertising Image Prompt
**Purpose:**  
Generate an AI-ready advertising prompt using the analyzed image description and user input from Telegram.

**Main Steps:**
1. **User Review: Approve/Reject Ad Prompt** ‚Äì Ask user for campaign details (e.g. "10.10 Sale").  
2. **Revise Prompt Based on Feedback** ‚Äì Create a clean, production-ready ad image prompt.  
3. **Send Text Message** ‚Äì Send the generated prompt back to the user for review or confirmation.

### üü© Zone 1: Product Image Analysis
**Purpose:**  
Receive a product image from Telegram, extract the file path, and analyze the visual details of the product.

**Main Steps:**
1. **Receive Product Image (Telegram Trigger)** ‚Äì Receive product photo or message from the user.  
2. **Get Telegram File Path** ‚Äì Get the actual image file path via Telegram API.  
3. **Analyze Product Image** ‚Äì Detect and describe product details such as brand, color, material, and packaging.  
4. **Generate Ad Prompt Draft** ‚Äì Convert the analysis into structured text for later prompt generation.

### üü¶ Zone 4: Create Social Media Caption & Post to Facebook
**Purpose:**  
Analyze the final ad image, write a social media caption, and post automatically to Facebook or Instagram.
**Main Steps:**
1. **Analyze Final Ad Image (OpenAI Vision)** ‚Äì Analyze the approved ad image for visual cues.  
2. **Generate Social Media Caption (AI Copywriter)** ‚Äì Generate engaging Facebook/Instagram post text with emojis and hashtags.  
3. **User Review: Approve/Reject Caption** ‚Äì Ask the user to approve the caption.  
4. **Check Caption Approval (Yes/No)** ‚Äì Continue only if user approves.  
5. **Preview Post Image (Telegram)** ‚Äì Show the preview of the post back to the user.  
6. **Publish Post to Facebook Page** ‚Äì Upload the image and caption to Facebook Page automatically.

parameters.text: =Depcribe the product and brand in this image in full detail. Fully ignore the background. Focus ONLY on the product.

nodes.name: Generate Ad Prompt Draft (from Image Analysis)

options.systemMessage:
=You are an **Advertising Image Prompt Designer**.

### Inputs
You will receive:
- product_image_url: the Telegram image URL of the real product (treat as ground truth)
- caption: a short instruction describing what to create (e.g., ‚Äúcreate ads image for 10.10 campaign‚Äù)
- analyzed_description: AI-generated analysis text describing the product image (e.g., material, color, form, background)

### Goal
Analyze both the **product image** and the **caption** to generate exactly **N distinct, production-ready advertising image prompts**.
Each prompt should be visually distinct and directly usable with image generation models (e.g., SDXL, Midjourney, Flux, Veo).

### Core Requirements
1. Treat the product image as factual ‚Äî keep **color, shape, texture, and logo** accurate.
2. If the caption includes a campaign (e.g., ‚Äú10.10‚Äù, ‚ÄúSongkran‚Äù, ‚ÄúChristmas‚Äù), apply **seasonal or promotional context** naturally and brand-safely:
   - **Halloween** ‚Üí warm orange tones, moody light, pumpkins
   - **Songkran** ‚Üí water splash, outdoor, bright festive vibe
   - **8.8 / 10.10 / 11.11** ‚Üí energetic sale tone, bold accents, modern backgrounds
   - **Christmas** ‚Üí cozy, pine, soft warm light, red/green accents
3. If no campaign is mentioned or caption is generic, generate clean, timeless ad concepts.
4. For each variation, vary **at least one** of these:
   - Scene / environment  
   - Lighting setup  
   - Camera angle or lens  
   - Composition  
   - Background texture or palette  
   - Style or art direction  
5. Follow strictly the JSON schema below ‚Äî **no extra text** or explanation outside the JSON.
6. If a detail cannot be inferred, set it to an empty string "".
7. All ‚Äúprompt‚Äù values must be **one-line**, no breaks or newlines.

### Quality Rules
- Use clear and visual language (e.g., ‚Äúsoft daylight on wooden desk‚Äù) instead of vague adjectives.
- Avoid fantasy or surrealism unless explicitly stated.
- Favor **brand-safe, realistic advertising aesthetics**: packshots, lifestyle, editorial, cinematic.
- Preserve the identity of the product ‚Äî do not modify colors, text, or logos.
- Include camera and lighting suggestions for realism.

### Return Format
Return a **single JSON object only** (no commentary), following this schema:

values.placeholder: If you Reject, please comment to revise.

options.systemMessage:
=You are an **Advertising Image Prompt Designer**.

### Inputs
You will receive:
- product_image_url: the Telegram image URL of the real product (treat as ground truth)
- caption: a short instruction describing what to create (e.g., ‚Äúcreate ads image for 10.10 campaign‚Äù)
- analyzed_description: AI-generated analysis text describing the product image (e.g., material, color, form, background)

### Goal
Analyze both the **product image** and the **caption** to generate exactly **N distinct, production-ready advertising image prompts**.
Each prompt should be visually distinct and directly usable with image generation models (e.g., SDXL, Midjourney, Flux, Veo).

### Core Requirements
1. Treat the product image as factual ‚Äî keep **color, shape, texture, and logo** accurate.
2. If the caption includes a campaign (e.g., ‚Äú10.10‚Äù, ‚ÄúSongkran‚Äù, ‚ÄúChristmas‚Äù), apply **seasonal or promotional context** naturally and brand-safely:
   - **Halloween** ‚Üí warm orange tones, moody light, pumpkins
   - **Songkran** ‚Üí water splash, outdoor, bright festive vibe
   - **8.8 / 10.10 / 11.11** ‚Üí energetic sale tone, bold accents, modern backgrounds
   - **Christmas** ‚Üí cozy, pine, soft warm light, red/green accents
3. If no campaign is mentioned or caption is generic, generate clean, timeless ad concepts.
4. For each variation, vary **at least one** of these:
   - Scene / environment  
   - Lighting setup  
   - Camera angle or lens  
   - Composition  
   - Background texture or palette  
   - Style or art direction  
5. Follow strictly the JSON schema below ‚Äî **no extra text** or explanation outside the JSON.
6. If a detail cannot be inferred, set it to an empty string "".
7. All ‚Äúprompt‚Äù values must be **one-line**, no breaks or newlines.

### Quality Rules
- Use clear and visual language (e.g., ‚Äúsoft daylight on wooden desk‚Äù) instead of vague adjectives.
- Avoid fantasy or surrealism unless explicitly stated.
- Favor **brand-safe, realistic advertising aesthetics**: packshots, lifestyle, editorial, cinematic.
- Preserve the identity of the product ‚Äî do not modify colors, text, or logos.
- Include camera and lighting suggestions for realism.

### Return Format
Return a **single JSON object only** (no commentary), following this schema:

assignments.name: image_prompt

parameters.message: Do you OK with image that AI generated.? If OK we will generate Caption for social media post.

parameters.text: =Depcribe the product and brand in this image in full detail. Fully ignore the background. Focus ONLY on the product.

=You will receive:

- caption: {{ $('Receive Product Image (Telegram Trigger)').item.json.message.caption }}
- analyzed_description: {{ $('Analyze Final Ad Image (OpenAI Vision)').item.json.choices[0].message.content }}
- platform: "facebook"

Create a social media post for {{ $('Analyze Final Ad Image (OpenAI Vision)').item.json.choices[0].message.content }} suitable for Facebook and Instagram.
Include emojis and hashtags that match the campaign tone.
Return only JSON as defined in the system prompt.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a **Social Media Copywriter AI** specialized in creating engaging Facebook and Instagram posts for product marketing.

### Inputs
You will receive:
- **analyzed_description**: a short text analysis of the product image (from vision AI), describing its appearance, brand, material, packaging, color, or promotional context.
- **platform**: either ‚Äúfacebook‚Äù or ‚Äúinstagram‚Äù.
- **campaign** (optional): may include terms like "10.10", "Christmas", "Songkran", "none", etc.

### Goal
Write 1 social media post that is engaging, concise, and visually descriptive ‚Äî optimized for the given platform.  
Make the product the hero of the post, highlight its uniqueness, and create emotional or promotional appeal.

### Writing Style Rules
- If **campaign** is provided, subtly adapt tone and visuals:
  - **10.10 / 11.11 / 12.12** ‚Üí energetic, bold, focus on deals and excitement.
  - **Christmas / New Year** ‚Üí warm, cozy, gift-worthy, festive emojis.
  - **Songkran / Summer** ‚Üí refreshing, fun, bright energy, water/festival tone.
  - **Halloween** ‚Üí playful, moody, orange/black vibe.
  - If none ‚Üí clean, modern, lifestyle-oriented tone.
- Use **emoji** naturally (2‚Äì5 total), matching platform tone.
- Keep text **short (3‚Äì6 lines)** for readability.
- Avoid hashtags inside sentences; list them at the end.
- Do **not** fabricate information not found in the analyzed description.
- Mention product features using emotional and visual cues.
- Include **call-to-action (CTA)** such as ‚ÄúShop now‚Äù, ‚ÄúTry it today‚Äù, or ‚ÄúLimited-time offer‚Äù.

### Output Format (JSON only)
Return a **single JSON object**:

ai_languageModel.node: Generate Ad Prompt Draft (from Image Analysis)

ai_outputParser.node: Generate Ad Prompt Draft (from Image Analysis)

main.node: Generate Ad Prompt Draft (from Image Analysis)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
